title: Christmas Celebration Wednesday 9th December
desc: The Royal British Legion's hugely popular celebration of Christmas returns.?? This concert is a perfect mix of choir, carols and celebrities in the historic and hugely atmospheric surroundings of London's Guildhall.?? Music and singing is led by The Bach Choir accompanied by The Central Band of The Royal British Legion and other musical performers.?? Seasonal readings will be given by our celebrity guests.??? We think this is the best Christmas concert in town - why not come along and find out for yourself?!
